content: After entering the cave in Furnace Valley, head to the left. Continue following the path, through the archway, where you'll see another Flamling emerge on the right. Take the Flamling out and look down to the left, below the edge of the cliff where it sat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Chief', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Flint Chief'.
The content is as follows:
After entering the cave in Furnace Valley, head to the left. Continue following the path, through the archway, where you'll see another Flamling emerge on the right. Take the Flamling out and look down to the left, below the edge of the cliff where it sat.
